result.title: Project handbook and quality plan
result.description: This Public deliverable will address adopted procedures (including guidelines, templates, deliverables and milestones) for handling documents (document numbering, classification and status of documents etc.). Special attention will be placed on the quality check of the technical deliverables and documents submitted to the S2R JU and data management plan (access rights to info inside / outside the consortium). Templates will be based on the S2R Handbook e.g. deliverable, periodic report.
